i1.name: Dismounted_Skaarl_the_Cowardly_Lizard
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Kled''' is only vulnerable to {{tip|death}} while unmounted. '''Kled''' has {{sti|health|{{as|{{pp|{{ccd|Kled|hp_base}}+{{ccd|Kled|hp_lvl}}*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))}} '''base''' health}}}}, which is not improved by sources of {{as|'''bonus''' health}}, as well as reduced {{as|'''base''' movement speed}} and increased {{sti|attack range}}. Percent-health effects consider '''Kled & Skaarl's''' combined {{as|'''maximum''' health}}, meaning that an unmounted '''Kled''' is always considered to be ''low'' health.

'''Kled''' gains {{pp|100 to 185|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} when moving towards {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy {{tip|champions}} within {{tt|1000|center to center}} units, but his basic attacks against them are reduced to {{as|80% AD}} damage. Additionally, he gains the ability to restore '''Skaarl's''' {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 3|Kled|''{{as|Courage|buzzword}}''}} to {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard|Kled|reunite}} again.

{{sbc|Innate - Courage:}} '''Kled''' gains 15 {{as|Courage|buzzword}} when [[basic attack|basic attacking]] an enemy champion, 20 {{as|Courage|buzzword}} whenever he scores a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy {{tip|champion}} within 3 seconds of damaging them, 4 {{as|Courage|buzzword}} for {{tip|minion}} kills, and 5 {{as|Courage|buzzword}} when basic attacking a [[structures|structure]] or epic {{tip|monster}}. At 100 {{as|Courage|buzzword}}, '''Skaarl''' returns with {{as|{{pp|key=%|50 to 80 for 4|1 to 16}} of '''Skaarl's''' '''maximum''' health}} after remounting over {{fd|0.7}} seconds. {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard|Kled|''Mounting up''}} resets the {{sti|cooldowns}} of {{ai|Bear Trap on a Rope|Kled}} and {{ai|Jousting|Kled}}.

While at the allied [[Spawn|fountain]], 25 {{as|Courage|buzzword}} is generated every {{fd|0.25}} seconds. {{si|Recall|Recalling}} fully restores '''Skaarl's''' {{as|Courage|buzzword}} and health. If reuniting outside of base, '''Skaarl''' gets ''Frayed Nerves'', which prevents him from gaining {{as|Courage|buzzword}} for 30 seconds.

The current status of '''Kled's''' own health is preserved between subsequent dismounts. While mounted, {{tip|heal|healing}} will first affect '''Skaarl's''' health and will only restore '''Kled's''' health while '''Skaarl''' is at ''full'' health.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Kled is only vulnerable to death while unmounted. Kled has Unknown value: ccd / Kled / hp_base+Unknown value: ccd / Kled / hp_lvl*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1)) − undefined (based on level) base health, which is not improved by sources of bonus health, as well as reduced base movement speed and increased attack range. Percent-health effects consider Kled & Skaarl's combined maximum health, meaning that an unmounted Kled is always considered to be low health.
Kled gains 100 − 185 (based on level) bonus movement speed when moving towards visible enemy champions within 1000 units, but his basic attacks against them are reduced to 80% AD damage. Additionally, he gains the ability to restore Skaarl's Kled's Courage to Kled's reunite again.
Innate - Courage: Kled gains 15 Courage when basic attack an enemy champion, 20 Courage whenever he scores a takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them, 4 Courage for minion kills, and 5 Courage when basic attacking a structures or epic monster. At 100 Courage, Skaarl returns with 1 to 16 ‒ undefined of Skaarl's maximum health after remounting over 0.7 seconds. Kled's Mounting up resets the cooldowns of Kled's Bear Trap on a Rope and Kled's Jousting.
While at the allied Spawn, 25 Courage is generated every 0.25 seconds. Recall fully restores Skaarl's Courage and health. If reuniting outside of base, Skaarl gets Frayed Nerves, which prevents him from gaining Courage for 30 seconds.
The current status of Kled's own health is preserved between subsequent dismounts. While mounted, healing will first affect Skaarl's health and will only restore Kled's health while Skaarl is at full health.
i1.notes:
* {{tip|Clone|Clones}} are counted as champions for all of this passive's effects, other than the takedown one.
* It is possible to get the {{as|Courage|buzzword}} from base but have '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' reunite out of base.
* If '''Kled''' achieves 100 {{as|Courage|buzzword}} while {{tip|resurrection|resurrecting}} or enters it while in the process of remounting, the remount will be deferred to after he revives.
* {{Pending for test}} {{ai|Wild Growth|Lulu}} and {{ii|Elixir of Iron}}

q1.name: Pocket_Pistol
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kled''' periodically [[stock]]s an ammo charge, up to a maximum of 2. '''Kled''' will store ammo even while {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard|Kled|mounted}}.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Kled''' sprays a cone of five ''pellets'' in the target direction while {{tip|dash|recoiling}} 300 units in the opposite direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit.

''Pellets'' collide into the first enemy {{tip|champion}} they hit, and deal 20% damage per pellet beyond the first. Each ''pellet'' that hits an enemy {{tip|champion}} or epic {{tip|monster}} restores {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 3|Kled|Courage}}, by 5 and {{fd|2.5}} respectively.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Kled periodically stocks an ammo charge, up to a maximum of 2. Kled will store ammo even while Kled's mounted.
Active: Kled sprays a cone of five pellets in the target direction while recoiling 300 units in the opposite direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit.
Pellets collide into the first enemy champion they hit, and deal 20% damage per pellet beyond the first. Each pellet that hits an enemy champion or epic monster restores Kled's Courage, by 5 and 2.5 respectively.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|35 to 95}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|35*1.8 to 95*1.8}} {{as|(+ 144% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* The backwards dash from ''Pocket Pistol'' can pass terrain.
* ''Pocket Pistol'' can be cast while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}} but '''Kled''' will not {{tip|dash}} backwards.
{{Effect at cast time end}}
* {{ii|Black Cleaver}} will specifically apply a stack for every pellet hit.
q1.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  1 as 1 and riot's value 0,0,0,0,0 as 0
q1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '3' as '3' and riot's value '11,10,9,8,7' as '11/10/9/8/7'

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 80% bonus AD)
  • Maximum Damage: (+ 144% bonus AD)

w1.name: Violent_Tendencies
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kled''' periodically gains ''Violent Tendencies'', which starts expiring upon his next basic attack.

{{sbc|Violent Tendencies:}} '''Kled''' gains {{sti|attack speed|{{as|150% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} on his next 4 basic attacks within 4 seconds. The final attack dealing {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, capped against {{tip|monster|monsters}}.
''{{tip|Turrets}} are only affected by the base damage.''
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Kled periodically gains Violent Tendencies, which starts expiring upon his next basic attack.
Violent Tendencies: Kled gains 150% bonus attack speed on his next 4 basic attacks within 4 seconds. The final attack dealing bonus physical damage, capped against monsters.
Turrets are only affected by the base damage.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 60}} {{as|(+ {{ap|4.5 to 6.5}}% {{as|(+ 5% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Maximum Damage Against Monsters|{{ap|220 to 260}}}}
w1.notes:
* The bonus damage applies {{sti|life steal|link=true}}.
* Attacking a [[jungle plants|plant]] will not activate the effect.
** This is intentional to prevent '''Kled''' from "wasting" the cooldown.

effects.str:
• Bonus Physical Damage: (+ % (+ 5% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health)
  • Maximum Damage Against Monsters:

st_slices: (+ % (+ 5% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health)

e1.name: Unmounted_Jousting
description: This ability is unusable while {{ai|Dismounted Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard|Kled|unmounted}}.
e1.descriptionHtml: This ability is unusable while Kled's unmounted.
e1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '0' as '0' and riot's value '13,12,11,10,9' as '13/12/11/10/9'
